page.title: 13NAVAL COOK,SULTAN,GOSPORT.
page.content: My name is Robert Lunt and I live at 49 Gorselands Way Rowner Gosport.My Dad is a leading cook at Sultan and he works in the main galley.There are 26-30 people work in the main galley and dining hall.My Dad has worked there for 6 months 6 days.My Dad likes working there and he likes the people there.His boss is very kind to him.My Dad is a very good cook.He can cook twenty different kinds of food.When he comes out of the Navy he will get 14500 pounds.My Dad is going to take us to America to see Disney Land,when we come back we are going to live in Liverpool. My Dad has worked in the galley on board a ship.The galley on a ship is quite small and the chef has to manage to cook good meals for all of the ship's crew.The meals must be ready on time.
